lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas spent two hours on Wednesday denying every accusation made about him by Anucha Browne Sanders, the former Knicks’ senior vice president of marketing who is suing him for sexual harassment.
snippet: Isiah Thomas spent two hours on Wednesday denying every accusation made about him by Anucha Browne Sanders, the former Knicks’ senior vice president of marketing who is suing him for sexual harassment.
